Module it.polimi.ingsw
Package it.polimi.ingsw.gui

Class PlayController

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.gui.PlayController
public class PlayController extends Object
Controller for the actual game part of the graphical application

  • Field Summary

    Queue of message sent by the player from the graphical application ready to be retrieved from the ClientApp

    Integer representing the choice for the desired card to place in the playground

  • Method Details

    • initialize

      public void initialize()
      Initializes vital components after @FXML fields are populated. It sets up a listener for the zoom slider, the group of buttons to choose the cards to view (hand / table / achievements), the maps used to visualize the pawns on the scoreboard and the choicebox to select the playground

      public void displaySuccessfulPlace(String recipient, int score)
      Display a successful card placed message
      Parameters:
      recipient - name of the player who placed the card
      score - integer representing the possible score obtained by the player

      Parameters:

    • alertToDraw

      public void alertToDraw()
      Alerts the player to draw a card from the table

    • genericAlert

      public void genericAlert(String str)
      Displays a generic alert message for the player

    • passStarterCard

      public void passStarterCard(StarterCard str, Player self, ArrayList<GoldCard> commonGold, Resource goldDeck, ArrayList<ResourceCard> commonResource, Resource resourceDeck)
      Displays the two sides of the starter cards allowing the player to choose one, it also loads the images of cards in the hand and in the table
      Parameters:
      str - the starter card
      self - the local player
      commonGold - the two gold card cards on the table
      goldDeck - the resource of the card on top of the gold deck
      commonResource - the two resource card cards on the table
      resourceDeck - the resource of the card on top of the resource deck

    • passAchievement

      public void passAchievement(ArrayList<AchievementCard> ach, ArrayList<AchievementCard> achievements)
      Displays the two possible secrets achievements allowing the player to choose one
      Parameters:
      ach - the shared achievements
      achievements - the two choosable achievements

    • updateTableCards

      public void updateTableCards(ArrayList<GoldCard> commonGold, Resource goldDeck, ArrayList<ResourceCard> commonResource, Resource resourceDeck)
      Updates the cards on the table
      Parameters:
      commonGold - the two gold card cards on the table
      goldDeck - the resource of the card on top of the gold deck
      commonResource - the two resource card cards on the table
      resourceDeck - the resource of the card on top of the resource deck

    • alertToPlace

      public void alertToPlace()
      Alerts the player to place a card on the playground and displays the cells where cards could be placed

    • alertToRePlace

      public void alertToRePlace()
      Alerts the player to replace a card on the playground after an irregular placing and displays the cells where cards could be placed

    • discoverPlace

      public PlacingCardAction discoverPlace()
      Retrieves possible existing action created when placing a card The client calls this method periodically after an alertToPlace
      Returns:
      placing card action containing the info on the card placed

    • discoverDraw

      public ChosenDrawCardAction discoverDraw()
      Retrieves possible existing action created when drawing a card The client calls this method periodically after an alertToDraw
      Returns:
      placing card action containing the info on the card drawn

    • setupStartedGame

      public void setupStartedGame(Player myPlayer, ArrayList<Player> otherPlayers, ArrayList<AchievementCard> achievements, ArrayList<GoldCard> commonGold, Resource goldDeck, ArrayList<ResourceCard> commonResource, Resource resourceDeck)
      Sets all the panels of the graphical application on game already started Used by client after a reconnection
      Parameters:
      myPlayer - local player
      otherPlayers - all other players in the game
      achievements - achievements of the player, including the secret one
      commonGold - the two gold card cards on the table
      goldDeck - the resource of the card on top of the gold deck
      commonResource - the two resource card cards on the table
      resourceDeck - the resource of the card on top of the resource deck

    • setNickname

      public void setNickname(String nick)
      Sets the nickname of the local player
      Parameters:
      nick - name of the player

    • setPlayer

      public void setPlayer(Player myPlayer)
      Sets or updates the values of the local player
      Parameters:
      myPlayer - the local player

    • setOtherPlayers

      public void setOtherPlayers(ArrayList<Player> otherPlayers)
      Sets or updates the values of the other players in the game, reprints a playground if is currently visualized and updates the scoreboard
      Parameters:
      otherPlayers -
